text: @LRinaldiArt I had pneumonia for a month b4 it got diagnosed not only would my job never send me home during that month, but they tried to get me to ignore the doctor’s orders & keep working. Also I had to keep going to my anatomy course because the prof wouldn’t excuse me or let me make up
